class.name: BTRunLimit
class.brief_description: BT decorator that allows child's execution a limited number of times.
class.description: BT decorator that allows child's execution a limited number of times defined by [member run_limit]. Returns [code]FAILURE[/code], if a limit on executions is exceeded. Otherwise, returns child's status.

members.member: A limit on number of times the child is allowed to be executed.
